statements: SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT vendor_phone, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id > 3 ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_phone FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id < 5 ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email, vendor_phone FROM vendors;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2 ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_phone FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_phone IS NOT NULL AND vendor_email <> '' LIMIT 5;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_phone FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id IN (3, 4, 5)
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_phone FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT vendor_name, payment_amount FROM vendors INNER JOIN payments ON vendors.vendor_id = payments.vendor_id WHERE payment_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY vendor_name
SELECT vendor_name, payment_date FROM vendors INNER JOIN payments ON vendors.vendor_id = payments.vendor_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT vendor_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM vendors INNER JOIN payments ON vendors.vendor_id = payments.vendor_id WHERE vendor_name IN ('ABC Inc', 'XYZ Corp') ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM vendor_info;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendor_info WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, supplier_phone FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT partner_name FROM partner_info ORDER BY partner_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_info WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendor_info ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id > 1000 AND supplier_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT partner_id, partner_name, partner_email FROM partner_info WHERE partner_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_email, vendor_phone FROM vendor_info WHERE vendor_phone LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email, COUNT(*) FROM vendors GROUP BY vendor_name, vendor_email HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT p.product_name, p.product_price, v.vendor_name FROM products p LEFT JOIN vendors v ON p.vendor_id = v.vendor_id;
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, p.product_name, p.product_price, o.quantity FROM orders o INNER JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(o.quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(o.quantity * p.product_price) AS revenue FROM products p INNER JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY vendor_phone_number ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, sum(order_quantity) as total_quantity_ordered FROM orders GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity_ordered > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_amount FROM suppliers JOIN payments ON suppliers.supplier_id = payments.supplier_id WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
